tool.name: Finalize_scu

param.name: in_Feats
param.dialogReference: Input polygon feature class representing Stream Conservation Units with catchment buffers

param.name: dil_Dist
param.dialogReference: Dilation distance used to aggregate features. This must be a positive value. If any features are within twice this distance of each other, they will be combined into a single output feature.

param.name: out_Feats
param.dialogReference: Output polygon feature class representing final Stream Conservation Units (aggregated and smoothed)

param.name: smthMulti
param.dialogReference: Smoothing multiplier. This is the amount by which the dilation distance is multiplied for use in the final smoothing operation. It must be a positive value. Larger values will generate smoother, more generalized features. Smaller values will tend to generate features with "scalloped" edges.

tool.summary: Aggregates and smoothes Stream Conservation Units to produce final output polygons

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Aggregates and smoothes Stream Conservation Units to produce final output polygons
